name: Vtopmart 2Pack 1860ml/ 63oz Large Glass Storage Containers with Lids, Meal Prep Food Container Set with Snap Airtight Lid for Baking, Microwave, Oven, Leak Proof, for Freezer, Dishwasher, Grey
short_description: 【Large Glass Containers With Lids】Vtopmart 63oz(1860ml) glass food container set, large size glass containers are perfect for family meal prep, baking and roasting chicken, lasagna. They can withstand temperatures from -4ºF to 752ºF (-20ºC to 400°C) which is good for food storage in fridge and keep food fresh. And you would eaily use the containers for roasting in oven. NOTE: Before putting it into the microwave/ oven, please take off the lids. 【Premium Glass & BPA Free】The glass containers are made of high quality borosilicate glass, making it safe for food storage. It is suitable for storing fruits, vegetables, salads, cereals, meals, meat, pasta, soups. It is a good choice for preparing meals at home, easy to get a healthy life. 【Stackable And Space-Saving】The food storage containers have stackable design, which keep refrigerator and kitchen organized, making it easier for food storage. And the clear containers make it easy to identify contents at a glance.

name: 40pc Set Glass Food Storage Containers & Bowls with Airtight Lids - Leakproof BPA-Free Meal Prep Airtight Stackable Lunch Boxes, Kitchen Pantry & Storage Organizers - Microwave Freezer Dishwasher Safe
short_description: 40-PIECE GLASS STORAGE SET WITH AIRTIGHT LIDS: Includes a variety of small, medium, and large rectangular and square containers with BPA-free, airtight silicone lids to keep food fresh, leakproof, and odor-free. Square containers - 2 x 320ml (10.8oz), 2 x 520ml (17.9oz), 2 x 800ml (27oz), 1 x 1200ml (40.5oz). and 5 x 33ml (1.1oz) Round containers. Perfect for every meal and every occasion, from snacks to big family dinners. MULTI-PURPOSE, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Stackable and nestable glass containers for kitchen organization—ideal for meal prep, leftovers, snacks, soups, casseroles, and baking dishes. Perfect for refrigerator, freezer, pantry, and cabinet storage. SAFE & DURABLE MATERIALS: Made from premium, BPA-free glass and silicone lids, these containers are safe for microwave, freezer, dishwasher, and oven use (up to 960°F without lids). Stain and odor-resistant, ensuring long-lasting use. LEAKPROOF & AIRTIGHT LIDS: The 4-side locking system with silicone gaskets ensures a watertight seal, preventing spills and leaks. Perfect for on-the-go meals, lunchboxes, meal prep, and storing liquids like soups, sauces, and dressings. VERSATILE FOR ALL STORAGE NEEDS: Use as lunch boxes, snack containers, baking dishes, or mixing bowls. Great for storing fruits, vegetables, leftovers, dry goods, or prepping meals for work, gym, picnics, and travel. PERFECT FOR EVERY KITCHEN: A must-have for home essentials, apartments, and dorms. These reusable, eco-friendly containers are perfect for daily use, meal prep, and gift ideas.
product_description: Upgrade your kitchen organization with this 40-Piece Glass Food Storage Container Set — the ultimate solution for all your food prep, storage, and organization needs. Designed with versatility, durability, and convenience in mind, this set includes a variety of small, medium, and large containers in both rectangular square and round shapes to suit any storage requirement. Each container comes with airtight, leakproof lids featuring a 4-side locking system to keep your food fresh, dry, and secure. Say goodbye to spills and leaks—perfect for storing soups, sauces, snacks, and meal preps without the mess. The clear glass makes it easy to see your food storage, ensuring you enjoy convenient fresh meals every time. Made from premium BPA-free glass , these containers are safe for the microwave, freezer, and dishwasher (lids top-rack recommended) and oven-safe up to 960°F (without the lid). Whether you're meal prepping for the week, storing leftovers, or packing lunch for work, these durable containers are built to last. The **crystal-clear glass design** allows you to easily see what's inside, while the **stackable, space-saving design** keeps your fridge, pantry, and cabinets organized and clutter-free. Perfect for meal preppers, busy families, and kitchen enthusiasts , these containers are ideal for a variety of uses—storing fruits, vegetables, dry goods, casseroles, baked dishes, and more. They also make an excellent gift for housewarmings, holidays, or new apartment essentials. Comparable with popular kitchen brands like Pyrex, Rubbermaid, and Snapware, this multi-purpose set is a must-have for every kitchen. Durable, reusable, and eco-friendly, these containers are the perfect balance of practicality and style.
